item.title: Understanding Date in Javascript
item.description: Table of Contents Timezones ISO 8061 format Date Constructions Hi there ðŸ‘‹, i see that many developers are facing with problems about Date in javascript recently. Today, I gonna to show you how to use Date in js correctly. Timezones There are 2 definitions about timezones in js: UTC and Local time zones Local time refers to the timezone your computer is in. UTC is synonymous with Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) in practice.
